dict.acceptation: 存在；生存；生活；继续存在；

sent.orig: Are there any things that necessarily exist (or necessarily don't exist)?
sent.trans: 我们说——什么东西——存在——是什么意思？

sent.orig: The operation of determining if a condition that is supposed to exist does, in fact, exist.
sent.trans: 确定一个设想的条件是否实际上存在的操作。

sent.orig: Are there any things that we can prove exist (or prove don't exist)?What are they?
sent.trans: 什么东西——我们可以证明存在——什么东西——不能证明。

sent.orig: Of course both willing lenders and borrowers must exist for a debt bubble to exist.
sent.trans: 当然，对于现在的债务泡沫，既有自愿的贷款方也得有自愿的借款方，但是，谁应当被责怪？

sent.orig: Asas they exist, must exist on financial speculation.
sent.trans: 只要金融存在，金融投机就必然存在。
